Title: Object: Le repos de la Ste Famille
Series: Galerie du Musée Napoléon
Series: Musée Napoléon
Series: Galerie Napoléon
Series: Galerie du Musée de France
Description: Rest on the flight into Egypt, after Cantarini, with the Virgin sitting in the right foreground, cradling Christ Child, and St Joseph sleeping in the background, to left. c.1804/15 Etching and engraving
Curator's comments: From 'Galerie du Musée Napoléon', see 1856,0308.625 for comment. Engraved after a painting which is now in the Louvre (inv. 176).
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (2)
